About

Who are we?

We are a group of streaming guys from Intel.

User List

We have a user mail list at: User Mail List

Submit an issue

Please submit new issue to https://github.com/gearpump/gearpump/issues

Make code contribution

Contributions are warmly welcome! To contribute to Gearpump source code, please make a PR against https://github.com/gearpump/gearpump/pulls

To contribute to the contents in this site, make a PR to https://github.com/gearpump/gearpump.github.io

More Technical Support

For business cooperation and support, please contact xiang.zhong@intel.com kam.d.kasravi@intel.com weihua.jiang@intel.com

License

The source tree under http://github.com/gearpump/gearpump is Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

Acknowledgement

The netty transport code work is based on Apache Storm. Thanks Apache Storm contributors.
